text: Hey all! Some good news for you - we will be hosting two developer focused events at INBOUND :slightly_smiling_face: One will be a cocktail/happy hour networking event on the evening of Wednesday July 18th, and we’ll also be hosting some structured developer discussions in the Community Center on the INBOUND floor on Thursday July 19th from 2:15 to 3:45. More formal announcements to follow. There’s also <https://www.inbound.com/agenda/the-developer|a developer-focused agenda> on the INBOUND site you all might like to check out :)
